messages.content: Vocês podem falar comigo em portugês?
Claro que sim! Aqui está a minha lista de idiomas e recursos de idiomas desconhecidos. Fica on your way!
Vocês estão atualizados até que ano?

Claro, em 2021! Aqui estão ocorrendo atualização da lista. Você pode consultar a lista aqui: [https://www.languagesw.com/pt-BR/languages-spanish-portuguese-chilean-brazilian-swedish-danish-portuguese-german-croatian-hungarian-spanish-a-z-list-of-languages-by-year-updated-by-year-largest-language-group-updated-by-largest-language-group-spanish-b-list-of-languages-spanish-spanish-spanish-spanish-spanish-spanish-spanish-spanish-spanish-spanish-spanish-spanish-spanish-spanish-spanish-spanish-spanish-spanish-spanish-spanish-spanish-spanish-spanish-spanish-spanished-spanish-spanish-spanish-spanish-spanish-spanish-spanish-spanish-spanish-spanish-spanish-spanish-spanish-spanished-spanish-spanish-spanish-spanish-spanish-spanish-spanished-spanish-spanish-spanish-spanished-spanish-spanish-spanish-spanished-spanish-spanish-spanish-spanished-spanish-spanish-spanished-spanish-spanished-spanish-spanish-spanished-spanish-spanish-spanished-spanish-spanished-spanish-spanished-spanish-spanished-spanish-spanished-spanish-spanished-spanish-spanished-spanished-spanish-spanished-spanish-spanished-spanish-spanished-spanish-spanished-spanish-spanished-spanish-spanished-spanish-spanished-spanish-spanished-spanish-spanished-spanish-spanished-spanish-spanished-spanish-spanished-spanish-spanished-spanish-spanished-spanish-spanished-spanish-spanished-spanish-spanished-spanish-spanished-spanish-spanished-spanish-spanished-spanish-spanished-span
